Patent expirations leading to increased competition from biosimilars

controversies: Criticism over drug pricing strategies in emerging markets
Ethical concerns regarding affordability and access to medicines
social_issues: Affordability and access to medicines, especially in low-income countries
governance_issues: Navigating complex regulatory environments and potential reputational risks
